channel.title: Trade glitch on a lativoscape source
channel.description: there is a glitch on my server i just changed from davidscape source to lativoscape and if you trade whoever sent the request both people see the same inventory and they can't offer anything. here's a video. [url=http://s762.photobucket.com/albums/xx267/hoopman0123/?action=view&current=clip0003.flv]http://s762.photobucket.com/albums/xx267/hoopman0123/?action=view&current=clip0003.flv[/url]

item.title: Trade glitch on a lativoscape source
item.dc:creator: @justinxg27 justinxg27
item.description:
@justinxg27 wrote:

There’s nothing wrong with that server. It just simply does not have trade added.

Read full topic
